room_title: Escape room "Black Friday Bombing" by Holmes Escape Games in Houston
review: We came back to try the Exoneration of John Watkins room and it was a LOT easier than the Black Friday Bombing! We got out successfully! Yay! This place is so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Black Friday Bombing" by Holmes Escape Games in Houston
review: My family and I came in to try the Black Friday room and it was incredible! Definitely a challenging room that requires you to use more than just your eyes. The clues are very creative and especially exciting when you connect them together. Teamwork is key to escape in time, so I suggest a group of about 6 people. The current record to beat is 34 minutes. I'd definitely recommend this room to others and I'll be back to check out their other rooms. Great family and friend experience!

room_title: Escape room "Black Friday Bombing" by Holmes Escape Games in Houston
review: Just finished the Black Friday Room with the fam (one of the harder ones we were told) and finished with 1 min 44 sec to spare. Everyone enjoyed it and the staff was super nice!
